ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Kill-stealing bards?
ygData.msgSnippet: Is this another one that us bards are going to have to go out and find/document/prove or is Verant already aware of this? Taneran ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Is this another one that us bards are going to have to go out and
find/document/prove or is Verant already aware of this?

Taneran

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 15, 2000 10:27 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Kill-stealing bards?


> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Wed, 15 Mar 2000, Benjamin Jerrad Segal wrote:
> >
> > It's a bug. It has to do with a misappropriation of damage or something
> > when a pet is involved with a group. I've seen it happen many times,
for
>
> More fuel for the fire. While killing the Allizewsaur, we got
> the kill (could immediately loot) but no exp 3 times. A
> necro+pet was present at all times.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
